mapper.select: SELECT blogId,title,summary,article,likeCount,hitCount,commentCount,createDate,username,headUrl FROM blog INNER JOIN user ON blog.userId = user.userId order by createDate desc limit #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT blogId,title,summary,article,likeCount,hitCount,commentCount,createDate,username,headUrl FROM blog INNER JOIN user ON blog.userId = user.userId WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 365 DAY) <= date(createDate) order by 100 * likeCount + hitCount DESC limit #{offset},#{limit}
